column1: * 1980 - A Readers Guide to The Silmarillion is published.
* 2004 - wikipedia:76th_Academy_Awards: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King wins 11 Oscars out of 11 nominations. David Hemmings is featured in the In Memoriam feature.
** Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took escape from the Orcs and meet Treebeard.
** Treebeard leads the hobbits to Wellinghall and they drink the Ent-draughts.
** The Rohirrim attack at sunrise and destroy the Orcs
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee descend from the Emyn Muil and meet Gollum.
** Faramir sees the funeral boat of his brother Boromir.Category:Datesde:29. Februarfi:29. helmikuuta
